Posts.Content: Apr 13, 2008 11:16AM squeakypeaches wrote: That definitely makes sense since my platelet count is okay.  I do have a Neti pot and was wondering if it is okay to use right now.  I think I'll use it tonight. Thanks, everyone!
Posts.Title: Nose Bleed - Is This an Emergency? squeakypeaches debbiehag

Posts.Content: Apr 13, 2008 10:57AM squeakypeaches wrote: I had my 4th weekly treatment on Friday.  At that time, my platelets were pretty good (I think)...343. I'm wondering about this...I only slept for one hour on Friday night (7 to 8 on Saturday morning, to be exact), then was up all day on Saturday.  I went to bed at nine last night and slept for 14 hours.  Could not getting sleep at all the night after treatment have caused my counts to go down that much? I'm a terrible insomniac in the days after treatment.  I'm surprised I slept so much last night.
Posts.Title: Nose Bleed - Is This an Emergency? squeakypeaches debbiehag
